title: Log in issue help!
body: Hay! i need help with my login, i use my normal log but wont work but i tried to change my password a few weeks ago and try that but now that wont work and NOW i changed that password with a new one but that one wont work at all, but i just loged in to the league site with my 1st password but cant with the game. i need help please riot.

replies.body:
Hey there,

What error are you receiving?
Do you have the correct region selected at the login screen?
dont worry think i fixed it, thanks for trying though :)
